channel.title: 194 server to client packet information
channel.description:
Here is a list of the 194 server to client packet information so that someone can add it to the wiki
Payloads are the same unless otherwise stated
Packet 53: [url=https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:System_update]System update[/url] Packet 68: The same as 317 packet 34 except instead of reading an int for the second (optional) amount, it reads a middle-endian int Packet 98: [url=https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Skill_level]Set skill level[/url] Packet 156: [url=https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Send_message]Send message[/url] (only supports normal messages and trade requests) Packet 217: [url=https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Show_multi-combat]Show multi-combat[/url] Packet 248: [url=https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Interface_color]Interface color[/url]

item.title: 194 server to client packet information
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Here is a list of the 194 server to client packet information so that someone can add it to the wiki

Payloads are the same unless otherwise stated

Packet 53: System update
Packet 68: The same as 317 packet 34 except instead of reading an int for the second (optional) amount, it reads a middle-endian int
Packet 98: Set skill level
Packet 156: Send message (only supports normal messages and trade requests)
Packet 217: Show multi-combat
Packet 248: Interface color

Read full topic
